qualifications.title: General Building Contractor
qualifications.description: The General Building Contractor certification is issued to companies operating in the General field by Development Bureau, HKSAR Government.

qualifications.title: Specialist Contractor (Concrete)
qualifications.description: The Specialist Contractor (Concrete) certification is issued to companies operating in the Specialist field by Hong Kong Construction Association.

qualifications.title: Specialist Contractor (Earthworks)
qualifications.description: The Specialist Contractor (Earthworks) certification is issued to companies operating in the Specialist field by Hong Kong Institution of Engineers.

qualifications.title: Specialist Contractor (Foundation)
qualifications.description: The Specialist Contractor (Foundation) certification is issued to companies operating in the Specialist field by Development Bureau, HKSAR Government.

qualifications.title: Specialist Contractor (Structural Steel)
qualifications.description: The Specialist Contractor (Structural Steel) certification is issued to companies operating in the Specialist field by Hong Kong Construction Association.
